message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I think we can be fair and still both get a good deal. Let's split it 60/40, with me getting a little more since I'm the one making the offer this round.
I'll meet you halfway on the 60/40, but I get the bigger half this time
Let's just split it evenly. Inflation is eating away at our money, and I'd rather we both get a fair share than keep fighting over a few bucks.
